sentences.english: Everyone is welcomed to feel the passion given by this group of young students adoring the traditional Chinese music.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位莅临，来感受这群年轻学子热爱国乐的热情。

sentences.english: Teachers, in general, believe that the Chinese Instrument graded examinations play a positive role in helping students learning.
sentences.chinese: 教师普遍肯定国乐考级具备能帮助学生学习的功能。

sentences.english: Focused on the music sheet in front of him, Zhuo Xiyue enthusiastically instructs his class.
sentences.chinese: 专心看著眼前的歌谱，教导国乐的卓西岳活力十足。

sentences.english: Most of those participating in the Chinese Instrument graded examination are not from a music-related educational institution.
sentences.chinese: 参与台湾国乐考级的师生，大多是非音乐科班背景者。

definition: folk music, esp. for traditional instruments
Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
guqin or qin, a long zither with seven strings, plucked with the fingers
to perform on a musical instrument
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
zhongruan or alto lute, like pipa 琵琶 but bigger and lower range
